## Data Privacy Note

<!-- Important reminder about parish data -->

**Privacy Policy:** Parish records should contain **name and postal address only** - no Mass times, URLs, or frequently changing information.

- [ ] This issue respects privacy guidelines
- [ ] This issue requires additional data (explain justification)

## Geospatial Accuracy

<!-- How important is location accuracy for this issue? -->

- [ ] Critical - Affects ride distance calculations
- [ ] Important - Affects parish search
- [ ] Minor - Visual display only
- [ ] Not applicable
